Package view

Interface ViewControllerInteract

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ViewControllerInteractImpl
    public interface ViewControllerInteract
    This interface represents the view that gets commands from the controller and the methods that are called up based on the command provided by the controller.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void displayValueCompForCost​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String[] costData)
      This method displays the total cost invested on a certain date.
      void displayValueCompForOthers​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String[] column, java.lang.String[][] data, java.lang.String footer)
      This method helps to display the value and composition of a portfolio.
      void portfolioPerformanceOverTimeView​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String[] data, java.lang.String[] scaleStr, java.lang.String footer)
      This method displays the performance of portfolio over time
      void showStockDataScreen​(java.lang.String[] stockData)
      This method helps to display the current stock data on the screen
      void viewControllerInteract​(TypeofViews type, java.lang.String[] args, int length)
      This method helps to dispatch the operations to the corresponding methods based on the command received from the controller.

    • Method Detail

      • viewControllerInteract

        void viewControllerInteract​(TypeofViews type,
                            java.lang.String[] args,
                            int length)
        This method helps to dispatch the operations to the corresponding methods based on the command received from the controller.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of view to be rendered
        args - helper arguments if any provided by the controller
        length - the length of the arguments

      • displayValueCompForCost

        void displayValueCompForCost​(java.lang.String title,
                             java.lang.String[] costData)
        This method displays the total cost invested on a certain date.
        Parameters:
        title - title for display
        costData - data to be displayed

      • displayValueCompForOthers

        void displayValueCompForOthers​(java.lang.String title,
                               java.lang.String[] column,
                               java.lang.String[][] data,
                               java.lang.String footer)
        This method helps to display the value and composition of a portfolio.
        Parameters:
        title - title for display
        column - column data
        data - data to be displayed
        footer - footer to be displayed

      • portfolioPerformanceOverTimeView

        void portfolioPerformanceOverTimeView​(java.lang.String title,
                                      java.lang.String[] data,
                                      java.lang.String[] scaleStr,
                                      java.lang.String footer)
        This method displays the performance of portfolio over time
        Parameters:
        title - title to be displayed
        data - data to be displayed
        scaleStr - scale of the graph
        footer - footer to be displayed

      • showStockDataScreen

        void showStockDataScreen​(java.lang.String[] stockData)
        This method helps to display the current stock data on the screen
        Parameters:
        stockData - stock data to be displayed
